pages.text: $(li)The Fire Aspect enchantment can be applied in any kind of item.$(br)$(li)This enchantment inflicts the burn state of every creature that was hit with this enchanted item.
pages.title: Fire Aspect

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level II.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level III of this enchantment using an Ancient Tome (Fire Aspect).
